verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
The door was opened
Your light came flooding
O'er me, my Lord
My sinful selfishness
Was nailed upon the cross
With you, my Lord

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Fill my cup, my Lord God
Fill my cup, Lord Jesus
Fill my cup, my heart is empty
Without you, my Lord

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
The Word became flesh
The Truth became known
Through you, my Lord
Death was defeated
I, too, have new life
With you, my Lord
